ISSUE.TITLE: multiple LTAR to same table- not distinguishable in UI
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.90.5** - Create country hm city - Add second relation between country & city (hm/mm) - Try to add lookup field in country table. Two entries shown - but indistinguishable ![Screenshot 2022-04-21 at 12 41 46 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/164397891-47247a6d-d87e-477a-8c8b-9fc2dda311e3.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: add missing await and code cleanup Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: show LTAR column name instead of table name in Lookup/Rollup re #1811 #1768 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
